comments:
Run a fresh eclipse workspace
Load the platform-ui-tests
Notice the list of problems in the Problems view.
Change to hierarchy view.
BUG 1:
the resulting hierarchy doesn't look correct (blank top-level entries and other 
problems). I will attach a pic 
BUG 2:
When i shift-select (using mouse) items in the view I get an

pic of problems hierarchy view - hierarchy looks incorrect

Note: when you re-start eclipse again, the view will display the hierarchy 
properly.

Then, if you go back to flat list, exit, re-start and switch to hierarchy, you 
will see the problem again.
